name: Flappy Kingdom HD: Fly, bird, fly!
name_original: Flappy Kingdom HD: Fly, bird, fly!
description:
GAME DESCRIPTION:
New crazy action in Flappy Kingdom is wait for you! Buy a new charactes and locations, use bonuses and power-ups, compare your achivements with friends. Just tap and fly!

GAME FEATURES:
- New mechanics and features
- A lot of more new characters and locations
- Achivements and ratings
- New material graphics and pretty sound effects
